dct_title_s: Tabula geographica, in qva paradisus, nec non regiones, urbes, oppida, et loca describuntur, quorum in Genesi mentio fit
dct_alternative_sm: Tabula geographica, in qua paradisus, nec non regiones, urbes, oppida, et loca describuntur, quorum in Genesi mentio fit
dct_description_sm: auct. D.R.M. Mathes ; gedruckt t Amstelredam by Jan Evertss Cloppenborch ; Baptista Doetechmius sculp.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map given in "Miliaria germanica" and "Leucae horariae".
Shows topography, drainage, travel routes, places of historical interest.

16 pictorial vignettes surrounding map: [1] Genes. 1 cap. -- [2] Genes. 3 cap. -- [3] Genes. 4 cap. -- [4] Genes. 7 cap. -- [5] Genes. 11 cap. -- [6] Genes. 12 cap. -- [7] Genes. 19 cap. -- [8] Genes. 22 cap. -- [9] Genes. 27 cap. -- [10] Genes. 28 cap. -- [11] Genes. 32 cap. -- [12] Genes. 37 cap. -- [13] Genes. 41 cap. -- [14] Genes. 46 cap. -- [15] Genes. 49 cap. -- [16] DvB. inven.
